job_details.Vacaturetitel: Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time.
   Your role:
     * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.
job_details.full_text:
Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager

You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time.
   Your role:
     * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the design and development of algorithms, including ML/AI-based solutions for patient monitoring and risk prediction. While generative AI is mentioned, the core focus is on predictive modeling and algorithm development for vital signs analysis and biomarkers, aligning with the definition of an ML Engineer. The mention of project management is secondary to the core technical responsibilities.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions 'design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions' and 'Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms'. It also refers to 'vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction', which are core modeling tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction' directly relates to the application of ML/AI models for predictive tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'generative AI' in the context of developing patient measurement and monitoring solutions indicates the use of advanced modeling techniques.
The role involves leading projects and managing programs to develop 'patient measurement and monitoring solutions', implying the need to integrate algorithms into functional systems.
job_tasks.phrase: develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding the impact on patients ('touch more than 600 000 patients annually') and the healthcare context ('intensive care, general ward, or other care settings', 'medical-grade solutions', 'improve outcomes and reduce costs').
job_tasks.phrase: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs' shows an understanding of the business and clinical impact.
job_tasks.phrase: medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings' implies that the developed algorithms will be put into production environments, requiring operational considerations.
job_tasks.phrase: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings

job_tasks.justification: The role includes 'Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time', indicating a need to understand project lifecycles and business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies

soft_skills.phrase: Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation
works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams
develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions
Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader
